attr.title: The Sphinx of Time
attr.desc: Time slowed down -- a little at first, and no one noticed. Then the leaves began to stall in the sky. Join the crew of The Bahamut on a desperate voyage to the end of the universe to restart time itself in this sci-fi, time-warping mystery adventure featuring 30â€“60 minutes of fiendish puzzles, exploration, and point-and-click storytelling.
attr.inst: Download the game on itch.io (https://jfrisby.itch.io/the-sphinx-of-time), download, and copy the Sphinx.ags file to thesphinxoftime/gamedata
attr.inst_md: Download the game on [itch.io](https://jfrisby.itch.io/the-sphinx-of-time), download, and copy the `Sphinx.ags` file to `thesphinxoftime/gamedata`
